item.description:
Greetings incubators!

 

Just before I turn 29 at Incubator come join me for a yoga class in my backyard or we might meander over to park around the corner.

This will be an all levels class and we satisfy yogis who have some experience and will be accessible and appropriate for beginners.

In terms of styles, i teach a blend of classical vinyasa with elements of deep stretching that are incorporated in Forrest style and Yin Yoga postures.

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.  I completed my full teacher certification downtown at Back Bay Yoga and am also teacher trained in yin yoga.

The class is donation based.  Recommended donation is sliding scale $5-$15.  But please come by no matter if you can bring a donation or not.

I hope to see some of you there!

Peace, love, and basic human goodness,

 

Jason Jedrusiak
item.name: Yoga before Incubator
